functionDecorators.name: certificateControllerActivated
functionDecorators.description: Get activation status of certificate controller.

functionDecorators.name: certificateSigners
functionDecorators.description: Get certificate signer authorization for an operator.

parameterDecorators.name: operator
parameterDecorators.description: Address whom to check the certificate signer authorization for.

functionDecorators.name: checkCount
functionDecorators.description: Get number of transations already sent to this contract by the sender.

parameterDecorators.name: sender
parameterDecorators.description: Address whom to check the counter of.
